description.value:
A Handheld device that can analyse speech or text and translate it to another dialect. It is most effective in dealing with cultures with a language similar to Low Gothic, requires no test to translate to and from these. If character has Logic Skill, can make -20 Test to decipher basic meanings of alien languages (test may be harder or easier based on specifics). Outputs to screen, vox, etc.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 25 R
